name: Invicta Beam
description: Complete the Invicta Beam cartridges and reach the powerful undefeated game boss from your childhood.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 750, ATI Radeon R7 260X Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2GHz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 760 or higher Storage: 6 GB available space
